rules.name: Player Combat Roll
rules.description: The player rolls two dice and adds their SKILL score to determine their total for the combat round.
rules.behavior: Roll two dice, sum the result, and add the SKILL score.
rules.trigger: At the start of a combat round

rules.name: Enemy Combat Roll
rules.description: The enemy rolls two dice and adds their SKILL score to determine their total for the combat round.
rules.behavior: Roll two dice, sum the result, and add the enemy's SKILL score.
rules.trigger: At the start of a combat round

rules.name: Determine Round Winner
rules.description: Compare the totals of the player and the enemy to determine the winner of the round.
rules.behavior: Compare total_player and total_enemy to find the higher total.
rules.logic: if total_player > total_enemy then player_wins else enemy_wins

rules.name: Stamina Loss for Loser
rules.description: The loser of the round loses 2 STAMINA points.
rules.behavior: Subtract 2 from the loser's STAMINA points.
rules.logic: if player_wins then enemy_STAMINA -= 2 else player_STAMINA -= 2

rules.name: Character Creation - Skill
rules.description: To determine the SKILL attribute, roll one die and add 6.
rules.behavior: Roll one die, add 6 to the result to determine SKILL.
rules.trigger: At the start of character creation

rules.name: Character Creation - Stamina
rules.description: To determine the STAMINA attribute, roll two dice and add 12.
rules.behavior: Roll two dice, add 12 to the result to determine STAMINA.
rules.trigger: At the start of character creation

rules.name: Character Creation - Luck
rules.description: To determine the LUCK attribute, roll one die and add 6.
rules.behavior: Roll one die, add 6 to the result to determine LUCK.
rules.trigger: At the start of character creation

rules.name: Starting Items - Sword
rules.description: The Sword item increases SKILL by 2.
rules.behavior: Add 2 to SKILL when the Sword is equipped.

rules.name: Starting Items - Leather Armor
rules.description: The Leather Armor item reduces damage taken by 1.
rules.behavior: Reduce damage taken by 1 when wearing Leather Armor.

rules.name: Starting Items - Backpack
rules.description: The Backpack item can hold up to 8 items.
rules.behavior: Limit the number of items carried to 8.

rules.name: Starting Items - Lantern
rules.description: The Lantern item provides light in dark areas.
rules.behavior: Provide light in dark areas when the Lantern is equipped.

rules.name: Starting Items - Gold Pieces
rules.description: The player starts with 10 Gold Pieces.
rules.behavior: Add 10 to the player's Gold Pieces.
rules.trigger: At the start of the game

rules.name: Starting Items - Provisions
rules.description: Each Provision restores 4 STAMINA when consumed.
rules.behavior: Restore 4 STAMINA for each Provision consumed.
